title: Aggregation of Dependent Expert Distributions in Multimodal Variational Autoencoders
details: RA Mancisidor, R Jenssen, S Yu, M Kampffmeyer - arXiv preprint arXiv:2505.01134, 2025
abstract: Multimodal learning with variational autoencoders (VAEs) requires estimating joint distributions to evaluate the evidence lower bound (ELBO). Current methods, the product and mixture of experts, aggregate single-modality distributions assuming …
